section.para: Once a count tag has been created, the count tag is ready to have inventory quantities entered into it. To enter a count tag, select the Enter Count Tag option. The following screen will appear:
When entering a count tag, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the count tag number of the count tag you want to enter details for.
Displays item number automatically when count tag number is entered into Count Tag # field.
Displays site where count will take place.
Display lists all comments added prior to the current session.
